import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CandidateLogin=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://141.148.219.190:8000/api/candidate/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){alert("Login successful!");// ✅ Store email and profile status in session storage
sessionStorage.setItem("candidateEmail",email);sessionStorage.setItem("hasCompletedProfile",data.hasCompletedProfile?"true":"false");// ✅ Log for debugging
console.log("Profile Completed:",data.hasCompletedProfile);// ✅ Navigate immediately after session storage update
navigate(data.hasCompletedProfile?"/candidate-dashboard":"/candidate-details");}else{alert(`Login failed: ${data.message}`);}}catch(error){console.error("Error logging in:",error);alert("Something went wrong.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 to-purple-600",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-96",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-center text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"Candidate Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",className:"border p-2 w-full rounded",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",className:"border p-2 w-full rounded",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-500 text-white w-full py-2 rounded font-semibold hover:bg-blue-600 transition",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-center mt-4",children:["New user? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/candidate-signup",className:"text-blue-600",children:"Signup Here"})]})]})});};// ✅ Ensure export is at the bottom
export default CandidateLogin;
